<<<<<<< HEAD
Peters enlargement vpon the prayers of the Church. By Master Harris Harris, Robert, 1581-1658.
[8], 23, [1] p.
Printed by I. D[awson] for Iohn Bartlett, and are to be sould at the golden Cup, in the Gold-smiths Rowe in Cheapside, London : 1624.
On Acts XII, 6-7. Differs from the first edition in that it has an added preface. Printer's name from STC. Identified as STC 12340b on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======

[8], 23, [1] p.
Printed by I. D[awson] for Iohn Bartlett, and are to be sould at the golden Cup, in the Gold-smiths Rowe in Cheapside, London : 1624.
On Acts XII, 6-7. Differs from the first edition in that it has an added preface. Printer's name from STC. Identified as STC 12340b on UMI microfilm. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

I. D[awson]
the golden Cup, in the Gold-smiths Rowe in Cheapside
